name: Mutant Wars 3D
description:
Mutant Wars 3D is a cool real-time strategy game for everyone.

The main goal of the game is to capture all enemy locations on a large field. The enemy has the same goal, so it will not be easy.

Defend your locations and counterattack to take control of the enemy locations.

React quickly to enemy actions. Use strategy and tactics to win the battle for territory and move to the next level.
